keyFacts: Inmate Efrain Reyes (Reg. No. 85993-054) was placed in administrative detention at the New York MCC on July 16, 2019, pending an SIS investigation and threat assessment.
The stated reason for detention evolved to include 'COURTS SAY INMATE FELT THREATEN ON UNIT,' indicating he felt threatened in the general population.
Reyes was housed in Unit 7, with Unit Manager R. Proto and Caseworker A. Black assigned to him.
The documents show a series of procedural reviews (3-day, 7-day, and weekly) all resulting in the continuation of his segregation.
The inmate profile indicates Reyes was admitted as an adult pre-sentencing inmate on August 1, 2018, and was facing charges under 21 USC 846 and 841 (drug-related statutes).
